name: Paint Ball Panic
description:
You must shoot and jump through coloured obstacles to make your way to the end of each level in this colour themed 2D platformer.

This game was made for the HexCode Game Jam. 

Check out my youtube channel where I'll be posting a video on the making of this game: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPd07mTSylNZiIjBAG0az5A

Controls: 

Arrow Keys to move.

Z to dash

X to jump

C to shoot

V to switch colour

Enter to pause

I used Born2bSportyV2 by JapanYoshi as the main font and Funky Future 8 as the colour palette.
